text: The Voice of Firestone is a long-running radio and television program of classical music. The show featured leading singers in selections from opera and operetta. It was originally titled The Firestone Hour, it was first broadcast on the NBC Radio network on December 3, 1928Cox, Jim. Music Radio. McFarland Publishing. and was later also shown on television starting in 1949. The program was last broadcast in 1963. ==References== Category:American television series
title: The Voice of Firestone
